headline: ‘Irreversible’: No easy fix for water fouled by gas driller
author: MICHAEL RUBINKAM Associated Press
sentences: One of the best-known pollution cases ever to emerge from the U.S. drilling and fracking boom has entered a difficult new phase as prosecutors pursue criminal charges against the state’s most prolific gas driller — and push for a settlement they say could yield more significant benefits for homeowners than a conviction.
